title: Twitter-Based Professional Development Strategies for Educational Administrators

context.prior_knowledge: Basic social media usage and foundational understanding of educational systems
context.additional_context: Focuses on strengthening leadership competencies as an educational administrator in a digital device-enabled social learning environment

learning_goals: Learners will effectively network with educational administrator communities on Twitter platforms
Learners will search, analyze, and share educational leadership information on Twitter
Learners will translate Twitter-based learning experiences into actionable strategies for educational settings
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
